title: siridEnum krpai
sahitya:
siridEnum krpai purivAi iniyEnum tiruvEraga muraiyum guruparA enakku nI


anupallavi

  karuNAkaranAyum kaliyuga varadanAyum dharaNiyOrkkaruL purindu varuvOnE


caraNam    arpa sukhamE tarum parppala AshaiyAlE avaniyil iduvarai avadi palavuTrEn
narppadam peTrini nAn inidu vAzhavE nADi unai aDaiya en kEDu anaittum ODavE
